body: Hi Nelson, As Abraham mentioned the component is not designed to use test points as an input however you can use a trick to run your study using the test points. The component uses center point of each mesh face as the test points so you only need to generate some small meshes with single face instead of the test points. Here is an example: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/2GtxRmwiJrvvJtcGw41E3DYNl1HjBHMXpXrD2tgnziurJ0sqRXt5uvd06tsZ*MQ0xkPSF6Se*BKQstAXgIFUcmYNvhAYgw9*/testForRandomPoints.jpg)Mostapha
